DOC.brief_summary: Part one study consist baseline ( BL ) testing , 28 day daily supplementation XSurge , exercise protocol . The acute exercise protocol consist five visit , , first visit consist maximal strength test . The remain visit consist performance test muscle evaluation . Phase two study consist six week supervise resistance training along supplementation XSurge . Following six week training , subject complete second acute exercise protocol . Measures evaluate consist performance test muscle evaluation .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect XSurge Supplementation Biomarkers Performance From High Intensity Resistance Exercise
DOC.criteria: Recreationally active . Subject judged Investigator healthy free physical limitation Subject male 1835 age , inclusive Subject body mass index 18.034.9 kg/m2 Subject willing maintain habitual diet Subject willing abstain dietary supplementation Subject understand study procedure sign form provide informed consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study Investigators Subject currently enrol another clinical trial . Subject history presence clinically relevant cardiac , renal , hepatic , endocrine ( include diabetes mellitus ) , pulmonary , biliary , gastrointestinal , pancreatic , neurologic disorder . Subject history presence cancer prior 2 year , except nonmelanoma skin cancer . Subject unable perform physical exercise Subject current smoker quit within last 6 month Subject engage extreme diet include limited , Atkins , South Beach , Intermittent Fasting , etc . Subject allergic study product placebo Subject take nutritional supplement performance enhance drug Subjects donate blood plasma within previous week Subject chronic illness cause continuous medical care Taking type prescription overthecounter medication include limited corticosteroid , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug , antibiotic within 14 day prior screen visit .
